channel.title: Adding Animations and Gfx
channel.description:
I need help adding the gfx "1950" and the animation "10961" which is dragon claws to my project insanity client.
can anyone supply like tutorial on dong this? I want the actual way to add the animations and gfx, not a tutorial on adding dragon claws...
